img_summary: The image depicts the **Snake-Head Mushroom**, an uncommon ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the accompanying text, it can be found in **Black Wind Mountain and onwards** and is also available for purchase from the **Shrine store** after rescuing the **Shen Monkey Vendor** in Black Wind Mountain.
